articles.title: S. Korean Fishing Boat and Crew to Be Sent Back
articles.content:
S. Korean Fishing Boat and Crew to Be Sent Back
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- As already reported, the south Korean fishing boat "55 Daesung" was intercepted by navy men of the Korean People's Army while being engaged in illegal fishing operation after intruding into the economic waters of the north side in the East Sea of Korea on August 8.
					This was an intolerable infringement upon the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					But it was decided to send the boat and its crew back to south Korea from the compatriotic and humanitarian points of view, taking into consideration the fact that they admitted the seriousness of their act and gave assurances that they would never repeat such act and the south Korean Red Cross requested its counterpart in the DPRK to leniently forgive and send them back.

articles.title: Withdrawal of US Forces from S. Korea Demanded
articles.content:
Withdrawal of US Forces from S. Korea Demanded
 Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The Jurists Institute of Korea released a white paper Monday exposing the background against which the U.S. forces occupied south Korea, which marked the beginning of the division and misfortune of the Korean nation, and its illegality in connection with the lapse of 65 years since the U.S. enforced its colonial rule over south Korea after occupying it on Sept. 8, 1945.
					 Noting that the U.S. forces' occupation of south Korea was a product of the U.S. policy of dominating the whole of Korea, the white paper explained how it put south Korea under its control. 
					
					 It went on: 
					
					 The U.S. stretched tentacles of its aggression to Korea from a century ago. It persistently tried hard to put the whole of Korea under its control under the pretext of "trusteeship" during World War II, pursuant to its strategy of world domination.
					
					 As the Korean People's Revolutionary Army launched an all-out offensive operation for crushing the Japanese imperialists together with the former Soviet Army on August 9, 1945, this made Japan's surrender as clear as daylight. Much afraid of losing even an opportunity to set foot on the soil of Korea, the U.S. was busy hatching a plot to occupy even half of Korea at any cost. 
					
					 At the end of a series of confabs the U.S. came out with a proposal "for fixing the line for sharing the operation" to disarm the Imperial Japanese Army. This proposal was conveyed to MacArthur, commander-in-chief of the allied forces in the Pacific, on August 15 and put into practice. On Sept. 2, 1945 the U.S. let MacArthur to announce that the U.S. forces will occupy the areas south of the 38th parallel in Korea on U.S. imperialist aggression forces' warship "Missouri" that entered Yokohama Port, Japan. On Sept. 4 37-member advance team belonging to the 24th army corps of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces arrived at Kimpho, south Korea by air. The U.S. mobilized a great number of warships of its navy and even civilian ships to ensure Inchon landing of the Okinawa-based main force of the army corps on Sept. 8.
					
					The U.S. hurled more than 45,000 troops belonging to 6th, 7th and 40th divisions under the 24th army corps of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces to south Korea till October 1945, thus putting the whole of south Korea under its control.
					
					 The line extending hundreds of kilometers divided Korea into two parts. As a result, 514 villages disappeared, 8 counties and 122 villages, rivers, streams, railways and roads were divided into the north and the south.
					
					  The white paper cited concrete facts to prove that the U.S. occupation of south Korea was a wanton violation of the sovereignty of the Korean nation, a blatant breach of international agreements on the Korean issue and a flagrant violation of the universally recognized war laws and regulations of international law. 
					
					  After faking up the Syngman Rhee regime in the wake of its occupation of south Korea the U.S. ignited the Korean War to seize the whole of Korea and perpetrated the most cruel and barbarous air raids, bombardment and massacres, the white paper noted, and went on:
					
					 Though the old century is replaced by a new one, the dark clouds of a war are still hanging over the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					Since the division of Korea by the U.S. the people in the north and the south of Korea suffered damages to the tune of 64,959,854 million U.S. dollars as of 2005 and 43,139,020.63 million U.S. dollars as of 2003 respectively.
					
					 The white paper strongly demanded the U.S. halt its domination and interference in south Korea and pull its forces out of it without delay as required by the new century in which reconciliation, cooperation and development have become a main trend. 
					
					 It called upon all the peace-loving people and progressive jurists the world over to extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just struggle.

articles.title: Floral Basket from Lao President
articles.content:
Floral Basket from Lao President
 Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from Choummaly Saynasone, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and president of Laos, on the occasion of the 62nd birthday of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The basket was conveyed to an official concerned by Chaleune Warinthrasak, Lao ambassador to the DPRK, on Monday.

articles.title: Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Show to be Held
articles.content:
Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Show to be Held
 Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- A Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia show will take place in Pyongyang to celebrate the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Attending the show to be opened at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition early in October will be armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, overseas compatriots' organizations and foreigners. 
					
					 The show is a great political festival for praising the great persons as it will demonstrate the ardent desire and will of the army and people of the DPRK and the world progressives to hold President Kim Il Sung, founder-builder of the WPK, in high esteem forever and extend greatest glory to General Secretary Kim Jong Il who has always led the WPK along the road of victory.
					
					 During this show, shows of immortal flowers and visits to the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia hothouses are to be held in provinces.

articles.title: Korean People Hail Kim Jong Il's China Visit
articles.content:
Korean People Hail Kim Jong Il's China Visit
 Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are paying the highest tribute to General Secretary Kim Jong Il, who provided a new milestone in the history of the DPRK-China friendship with his five-day visit to China.
					 Ho Chol San, a department director of the Ministry of Light Industry, told KCNA that Kim Jong Il's second visit to China this year was a historical event clearly substantiating the high level the DPRK-China friendship was on.
					
					 He said that through his China visit he set an example in the development of friendly relations among the countries aspiring after the unity and cooperation under the banner of independence and made a great contribution to defending peace and stability in northeast Asia and the rest of the world and advancing the cause of socialism.
					
					 Kim Myong Ho, a department director of the Ministry of Agriculture, said in an interview with KCNA that Kim Jong Il's visit to China marked a significant occasion in injecting vitality in the bilateral relations in the new century and further deepening the friendship and comradeship between the two parties and the two people.
					
					 The news that he toured the Jilin and Heilongjiang Provinces, where President Kim Il Sung waged a hard-fought anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle with Chinese comrades, is stiring up the hearts of the people, he added.
					
					 An Chon Suk, a peasant of the Taesong Cooperative Farm, deeply touched by Kim Jong Il's foreign visit in the hot season, vowed to make a good job in agricultural production, remaining failthful to his Songun revolutionary leadership.

articles.title: Geological Prospecting Obtains Good Results
articles.content:
Geological Prospecting Obtains Good Results
 Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Geological prospecting for future purpose is going well in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The National Physical Prospecting Team, the National Mineral Resources Survey Team and the South Hamgyong Provincial Prospecting Bureau have reconfirmed the tectonics and deposits in Komdok area by modeling ore body on the basis of IT technology. 
					
					Geological survey teams under the North Hamgyong Provincial Prospecting Bureau have found out new coal and ore fields with large deposits in some areas of the province.
					
					 The South Hwanghae Provincial Prospecting Bureau has concentrated manpower and machines on prospecting districts to successfully confirm mineral deposits through detailed surveys. 
					
					 Large coal deposits have been explored in South Phyongan Province, too.

articles.title: Quality of Consumer Goods Raised
articles.content:
Quality of Consumer Goods Raised
 Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Light industry factories of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have steadily improved the quality of consumer goods, while increasing their output.
					 The Taedonggang Foodstuff Factory, the Kyongryon Aeguk Soda-pop Mill and many other foodstuff factories in Pyongyang have directed much effort to raising quality of products to please the taste of people.
					
					 The Wonsan Glass Bottle Factory, the Wonsan Shoes Factory and other light industry factories in Wonsan City have worked out schemes for turning out large quantities of quality consumer goods and pushed ahead with them.
					
					 Those in Hyesan City have increased the variety of consumer goods and bettered their quality by updating the production processes as required by the IT age.
					
					 The Songyo Knitted Goods Factory, which topped its July target at 117 percent, has streamlined its production processes and boosted the output of quality knitted fabrics by improving the workers' technique and skill. 
					
					 The Tongdaewon Industrial Crops Processing Factory has developed some 70 kinds of products with industrial crops abundant in the country.
					
					 The new products, including sports shoes, slippers, blind and cushion, are well received by people.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Dodge Settlement of Past Crimes
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Dodge Settlement of Past Crimes
 Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The Japanese government officially confirmed recently the information that more than 5,600 forcibly conscripted Koreans died at Japanese munitions enterprises,  coal mines and other work sites while being driven hard there during the Japanese imperialists' occupation of Korea.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This disclosed fact alone makes it easy to guess what monstrous crimes the Japanese imperialists committed against Koreans in the past.
					
					 This being a hard reality, Japan is running the whole gamut of sleight of hand to evade the responsibility for the settlement of its past crimes, defying the public mind-set at home and abroad.
					
					 The Japanese militarists are making desperate efforts to bring back those days when they could kill in cold blood people of Asia with their blood-stained swords. For this reason Japan is persistently seeking to evade the responsibility for the settlement of its past crimes.
					
					 It is a foolish dream for Japan to eye permanent membership of the UN Security Council and emerge a "leader of Asia" while working hard to dodge the settlement of its past crimes in a bid to realize its militarist ambition. 
					
					 This persistent behavior on the part of Japan would only touch off bitterer sentiment and resentment at it among the world public and throw it into the bottomless abyss of international isolation.
					
					Such sleight of hand will never work in the present times.
					
					 Japan would be well advised to bear this in mind and make a bold decision to redeem its past crimes, though belatedly.

articles.title: S. Korea Urged to Eradicate Hostile Feelings
articles.content:
S. Korea Urged to Eradicate Hostile Feelings
 Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The south Korean ruling forces are not regarding the people of the DPRK as fellow countrymen with whom they should join hands in the efforts to achieve national reunification but as their rival in the confrontation and "principal enemy". Due to these anachronistic and treacherous hostile feelings toward fellow countrymen the inter-Korean relations have been driven into a collapse and the danger of a war is increasing on the Korean Peninsula as the days go by. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The hostility toward fellow countrymen is the root cause of the collapse of the inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group is regarding the DPRK as its rival in the confrontation, denying the idea of "By our nation itself."
					
					 As soon as the group came to power, it has systematically brought to naught landmark achievements made in the inter-Korean relations under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration, talking about what it called "lost decade."
					
					 Due to these reckless acts of the south Korean ruling forces the inter-Korean relations have been brought to a collapse and the June 15 era of reunification has hit a big snag. This eloquently proves how seriously the conservative group's confrontation conception of indiscriminately antagonizing fellow countrymen affects the development of the inter-Korean relations and the cause of national reunification. 
					
					 The hostility toward fellow countrymen is the root cause of bringing the dark clouds of a war to hang over the fellow countrymen. 
					
					 It is due to the reckless moves of the puppet group to escalate the confrontation toward fellow countrymen that the situation remains so extremely tense on the Korean Peninsula that a war may break out any moment. 
					
					 The hostility of the group toward fellow countrymen finds a vivid manifestation in the fact that it is brutally suppressing the people from all walks of life desirous of reunification through alliance with the north, antagonizing them under the absurd pretext of linkage with it. 
					
					 Serious, indeed, is the baneful impact of the group of traitors' bitterness towards fellow countrymen on the development of the inter-Korean relations, peace of the country and democratic development of the south Korean society.
					
					 The hostile feelings of the group of traitors to the nation toward fellow countrymen and its consciousness of confrontation are its inveterate habits. As long as this group is allowed to stay in power in south Korea Koreans can neither improve the inter-Korean relations nor achieve reunification of the country.

articles.title: US-S. Korean Anti-Submarine Exercises Blasted
articles.content:
US-S. Korean Anti-Submarine Exercises Blasted
 Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification made public a statement on Sept. 3 in denunciation of the DPRK-targeted war exercises kicked off by the U.S. and the puppet bellicose forces.
					 The statement accused the U.S. and the sycophantic and traitorous Lee Myung Bak regime of jointly staging the DPRK-targeted anti-submarine exercises in the West Sea of Korea in the wake of waging the largest-ever joint naval maneuvers in the East Sea of Korea under the pretext of the case of warship sinking.
					
					 Condemning the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers for staging the dangerous war exercises against the desire of all the Koreans and other world people for peace, the statement said:
					
					 It is already a well-known fact that the case of the warship sinking and investigation into it were peppered with lies.
					
					 The U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group can never escape heavier political blow if they keep staging the adventurous military exercises, pushing the situation to an extreme phase with the case as a pretext, the statement warned.
					
					 It called on all the Koreans to oppose the war moves of the U.S. and sycophantic traitors and wage an anti-U.S. and anti-dictatorship struggle in firm unity under the banner of "By our nation itself".

articles.title: Court Decision Calls for Compensation for Compulsory Search
articles.content:
Court Decision Calls for Compensation for Compulsory Search
 Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The Tokyo District Court of Japan ruled on August 30 that Tokyo Metropolis should compensate for the search operations conducted by the Security Department of the Metropolitan Police Office against the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and its related facilities.
					When a Korean woman in Japan tried to carry with her medicines for her own use during her visit to the homeland by Mangyongbong-92 the Security Department brought against her "the charge of violating the law on medicines" on November 27, 2006. Under this pretext it perpetrated reckless search operations against the above-said headquarters and six other offices.
					
					 This was one more smear campaign to tarnish the image of the DPRK and Chongryon, escalate the suppression of Koreans in Japan and achieve a political aim.
					
					 Chongryon organizations including its Shibuse Branch and the Korean Song and Dance Ensemble in Tokyo filed a suit against Tokyo Metropolis governing the above-said department in demand of compensation.
					
					 At the hearing on this case the Tokyo District Court of Japan ruled that the search operations conducted against Chongryon-related facilities were a violation of the Constitution and the Criminal Procedure Law, demanding that Tokyo Metropolis pay damages to the Shibuse Branch of Chongryon, the Korean Song and Dance Ensemble in Tokyo and two officials of Chongryon.

articles.title: Exploits of Peerlessly Great Men Lauded
articles.content:
Exploits of Peerlessly Great Men Lauded
 Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, and Hasanul Huq Inu, chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, made public a joint statement on August 31 on the occasion of the 62nd anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The statement said that since President Kim Il Sung liberated Korea and founded the DPRK the Korean people have led an independent and creative life in all spheres of social life, being responsible for their own destiny and the DPRK has turned into a socialist power--independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defense--despite all trials of the history.
					
					 By founding the DPRK Kim Il Sung made a great immortal contribution to the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence, it said, adding:
					
					 Today the Korean people under the distinguished Songun leadership of General Secretary
						 Kim Jong Il are firmly defending the sovereignty of the country and dignity of the nation and speeding up the general advance for the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 We are firmly convinced that under his Songun leadership the Korean people would achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation in the near future.

articles.title: DPRK's Significant Day Observed
articles.content:
DPRK's Significant Day Observed
 Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Seminars, book and photo exhibitions and film shows took place in Sweden, Russia, Ethiopia, India and South Africa between Aug. 19 and 25 to mark the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 On display in the venues of exhibitions were books and photos on the undying Songun revolutionary leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and photos introducing the Korean people in the drive to build a thriving nation.
					
					 Appreciated at the film shows were "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation", "Pyongyang at Night", "Arms of Korea" and other Korean films.
					
					 Oskar Molleby, chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, noted at the seminar on Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" that he started the Songun revolutionary leadership by providing a field guidance to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on Aug. 25, 1960.
					
					 Thanks to his Songun leadership the DPRK could advance along the road of victory, he said.
					
					 Vorontsov, chief of the Section for Korea of the Institution of Oriental Studies of the Russian Academy of Sciences, said that Songun is the greatest political mode suitable to the present complicated situation of the Korean Peninsula. It is the clear fact that the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK have been defended under the Songun policy, he added.
					
					 The chief of a branch group of the Youth Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Ethiopia said that Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership is a basic factor that helps the DPRK, not a big country, safeguard its sovereignty and dignity and emerge victorious, squarely standing up to the U.S. styling itself "the only superpower" in the world.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar in Ethiopia.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Marked
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Marked
 Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Bulgaria and Nepal issued bulletins on Aug. 22 and 24 on the occasions of the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership and the 62nd birthday of the DPRK.
					 The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association carried an article titled "50th anniversary of Songun revolutionary leadership" in its bulletin.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has inspected the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army several times and strengthened the division in aspects of politico-ideology and military technique since he started his Songun revolutionary leadership by providing field guidance to it, the bulletin said, adding: His inspection to a unit under the division early in January this year was the manifestation of his steadfast will to dynamically advance the cause of socialism with the might of Songun.
					
					 The bulletin referred to the facts that the division performed feats in the operation to liberate Seoul during the last Fatherland Liberation War and that under the banner of Songun the self-reliant defence capabilities have been further increased and unprecedented eye-opening miracles wrought one after another on all fronts of socialist construction in the DPRK.
					
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Birthday of DPRK" noted that the DPRK has turned into a developed and prosperous country with the independent national economy thanks to President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In articles entitled "10th anniversary of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration" and "Conclusion of peace treaty is prerequisite to disarmament" the bulletin said that the inter-Korean joint declarations are the most just great programme for Korea's reunification and the idea of "By our nation itself" is the spirit and idea of the Korean nation in the June 15 era of reunification, adding that a peace treaty for terminating the state of war, the root cause of hostile relations, should be concluded before anything else to denuclearize the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The Nepal-Korea Friendship Association ran in its bulletin an article introducing the Songun leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Brazil
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Brazil
 Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" was brought out in booklet by the Asa Norte Publishing House of Brazil on Aug. 31.
					 The work, published on Sept. 5, Juche 97 (2008), says that the six decade-long history of the DPRK is a history of great struggle and victory and a history of great creation and changes in which the Korean people have defended the independence and honor of the country and built the prosperous and powerful socialist state, braving the tempest of revolution under the guidance of the great leader and the great party.  Expounded in it is the idea that even a small and underdeveloped country can turn into a developed and dignified power when it is guided by the great leader and the great party.
					
					 The work also indicates the task and ways for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche under the banner of the Juche idea, the banner of Songun.

articles.title: RPDC decide devolver barco surcoreano y tripulantes
articles.content:
RPDC decide devolver barco surcoreano y tripulantes
Pyongyang, 6 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Como ya trascendidos, el barco pesquero surcoreano "55 Daesung" fue detenido el 8 de agosto por las fuerzas maritimas del Ejercito Popular de Corea mientras realizaba la pesca ilicita tras invadir las aguas economicas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en el Mar Este de Corea.
					 Este acto es una violacion imperdonable de la soberania de la RPDC.
					
					 Pero, al tener en consideracion el hecho de que los tripulantes reconocieron la gravedad de su conducta y juraron no repetir las acciones por el estilo y la solicitud de la Sociedad de la Cruz Roja del Sur de Corea de perdonarlos con indulgencia y devolverlos, se ha tomado la decision de entregarlos partiendo de la fraternidad y el humanitarismo.

articles.title: AJC publica carta blanca sobre ocupacion del suelo surcoreano
articles.content:
AJC publica carta blanca sobre ocupacion del suelo surcoreano
 Pyongyang, 6 de septiembre (ATCC) -- En relacion con que se cumplen 65 anos desde cuando Estados Unidos comenzo a practicar la dominacion colonial sobre el Sur de Corea tras ocuparlo el 8 de septiembre de 1945, la Asociacion de Juristas de Corea (AJC) hizo publica el dia 6 una carta blanca para revelar el curso y el caracter ilegal de esta ocupacion que fue el inicio de la division y los sufrimientos de la nacion coreana. 
					 La ocupacion del Sur de Corea por parte de las tropas norteamericanas fue el producto de la politica de EE.UU. de dominar a Corea, senala la nota y revela el curso de ocupacion del Sur de Corea por parte de EE.UU. como sigue: 
					
					 Ya desde hace mas de un siglo, EE.UU. habia echado sus tentaculos de agresion a Corea. Y en el periodo de la Segunda Guerra Mundial, en virtud de su estrategia de dominar el mundo, el imperio recurrio obstinadamente a las maniobras para dominar toda Corea bajo el rotulo de "administracion en fideicomiso".
					
					 Pero, el 9 de agosto de 1945, el Ejercito Revolucionario Popular de Corea desarrollo junto con el ejercito de la ex URSS la ofensiva general para aniquilar a los imperialistas japoneses.
					
					 Ante la evidencia de la capitulacion de Japon y por su temor a perder la posibilidad de asentarse en el territorio coreano, EE.UU. se apresuro a idear algo para apoderarse a toda costa de la mitad de Corea. 
					
					 Al cabo de debates continuos, planteo el "proyecto" de desarmar al ejercito japones en las partes divididas de Corea "para las operaciones militares", el cual fue notificado el 15 de agosto al comandante en jefe del ejercito estadounidense en la region del Pacifico, MacArthur, quien lo puso en practica.
					
					 El 2 de septiembre de 1945, EE.UU. mando a MacArthur anunciar desde el buque de guerra "Missouri", anclado en el puerto de Yokohama de Japon, que las tropas norteamericanas tomarian la zona al sur del paralelo 38o de Corea.
					
					 Dos dias despues, llegaron a bordo de avion a Kimpho del Sur de Corea 37 soldados como avanzada del 24o cuerpo de las tropas agresoras norteamericanas, y el dia 8, desembarco en Inchon el grueso de este cuerpo, que estaba estacionado en Okinawa, usando los buques de la fuerza naval norteamericana y hasta los barcos civiles.
					
					 Hasta octubre de 1945, introdujo en el suelo surcoreano a mas de 45 mil efectivos de las divisiones no. 6, 7 y 40 del 24o cuerpo de las tropas norteamericanas, de manera que se completara la ocupacion de todo el territorio surcoreano. 
					
					 Debido a la linea de demarcacion militar de centenares de kilometros que atraviesa el medio de la Peninsula Coreana, desaparecieron 514 poblados y se dividieron en el Norte y el Sur 8 distritos, 122 aldeas, rios, riachuelos, vias ferroviarias y carreteras. 
					
					 La ocupacion del Sur de Corea por parte de las tropas norteamericanas fue un grave atentado a la soberania de la nacion coreana, una traicion cinica a los convenios internacionales sobre el problema coreano y una flagrante violacion a las reglas de guerra reconocidas por la ley internacional:
					
					 Tras ocupar el Sur de Corea y fabricar el "poder" de Syngman Rhee, EE.UU. provoco la guerra coreana  con el fin de apoderarse de todo el territorio coreano y perpetro de manera mas salvaje y barbara los bombardeos, canoneos y masacre. 
					
					 Desde entonces hasta la fecha, o sea, de un siglo al otro, persiste en la Peninsula Coreana el nubarron de la guerra. 
					
					 El monto total de las perdidas, que EE.UU. causo a los habitantes norcoreanos y los surcoreanos desde cuando dividio a Corea en dos partes, llega a 64 billones 959 mil 854 millones de US$ (hasta 2005) y 43 billones 139 mil 20 millones 630 mil US$ (hasta 2003), respectivamente.
					
					 Finalmente, la carta blanca exige fuertemente a EE.UU. dejarse de sus maniobras dominacionistas e intervencionistas en el Sur de Corea y sacar sin demora a sus tropas ocupantes del suelo surcoreano, de acuerdo con la demanda del nuevo siglo en que la reconciliacion, la cooperacion y el desarrollo se hacen una corriente principal. 
					
					 Exhorta a los pueblos pacifistas y los juristas progresistas de todo el mundo a enviar el activo apoyo y la solidaridad a la justa lucha del pueblo coreano.

articles.title: Pyongyang sera sede de exhibicion de Kimilsungias y Kimjongilias
articles.content:
Pyongyang sera sede de exhibicion de Kimilsungias y Kimjongilias
 Pyongyang, 6 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, se realizara en esta capital desde principios de octubre la Exhibicion de Kimilsungias y Kimjongilias.
					 En este evento cuya sede sera la Exposicion Permanente de Kimilsungias y Kimjongilias participaran las instituciones de las fuerzas armadas, los ministerios, los organos centrales, las entidades de coreanos en ultramar y los amigos extranjeros. 
					
					Esta exhibicion es un gran festival politico que manifiesta plenamente la aspiracion del ejercito y pueblo coreanos y la humanidad progresista del mundo a enaltecer eternamente al Presidente
						 Kim Il Sung, fundador y constructor del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, y a rendir la maxima gloria al Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quien conduce el PTC al unico camino de victorias.
					
					 Durante el festival, en todas las provincias se realizaran las exposiciones de esas flores y la visita a los invernaderos de las mismas.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena artimana de Japon por evitar liquidacion de pasado
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena artimana de Japon por evitar liquidacion de pasado
Pyongyang, 6 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Recientemente, el gobierno japones confirmo oficialmente los datos sobre mas de 5 mil 600 coreanos quienes durante la ocupacion de Japon sobre Corea fueron llevados forzosamente a las empresas de materiales belicos y minas de carbon de Japon y muertos en el terreno por duros trabajos.
					 Esto demuestra cuan grave fue la criminalidad del pasado de Japon.
					
					 Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 6 y continua:
					
					  Pero, el pais isleno se vale de todas las maneras para evitar a toda costa la liquidacion del pasado criminal negando la opinion publica interna y externa.
					
					  Los militaristas japoneses suenan siempre el pasado cuando trozaban arbitrariamente al continente asiatico y tratan de recuperarlo.
					
					  Por esta razon, Japon pretende evitar, cueste lo que cueste, la responsabilidad de la liquidacion del pasado abrigando la ambicion de militarismo.
					
					  Es vana ilusion su intento de ser pais miembro permanente del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU y "dueno" de Asia.
					
					  Si Japon sigue actuando como ahora, se agudizara mas el odio anti-Japon del mundo y se aislara mas en la arena internacional.
					
					  El pais isleno debe conocerlo bien y tomar, aunque sea ahora, la decision de liquidar el pasado criminal.
